pull_requests.title: BIP-0119: fix correct mismatched plot data in bip-0119 simulation
pull_requests.body: Fixed swapped data series in the simulation plot. The original code paired `blocktimes_c1` with `unspendable2` and `blocktimes_c2` with `unspendable` - mixing 1x and 2x rate data. Now each time series is correctly paired with its corresponding data.

comment_list.body: Noting that this PR is very similar to #1898.

Ah thanks, @jonatack, I had forgotten about that. We already went over that. I’m gonna close this PR, but if @reallesee can offer a good explanation on how this bug affects the chart, and why this change substantially improves the results, I’m happy to reopen it. (Please feel free to peruse the graphics in #1898, if it is not clear what I’m asking.)
